nodes.text: LEGO Star Wars: The Padawan Menace (book)
LEGO Star Wars: The Padawan Menace was a children's book released by Scholastic on January 1, 2012, a literary retelling of the short film LEGO Star Wars: The Padawan Menace.
Like the video version of LEGO Star Wars: The Padawan Menace, the book is also non-canon.
